DOC.brief_summary: UX023-CL301 multicenter , randomize , open-label , Phase 3 study compare efficacy safety KRN23 active control ( oral phosphate/active vitamin D therapy ) child XLH ( age 1 ≤12 year ) radiographic evidence rickets , open epiphysis , receive oral phosphate/active vitamin D therapy ≥ 6-12 consecutive month prior screen . Approximately 60 subject randomize 1:1 receive open-label KRN23 administer subcutaneous injection oral phosphate active vitamin D therapy total 64 week .
